DOC.brief_summary: A dose-ranging study of MK0431 in patients with type 2 diabetes who have inadequate control of their blood sugar.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of MK0431 in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes (0431-010)
DOC.criteria: Age 21 to 70, You are a man or nonpregnant woman Have a history of type I diabetes You are on a weight loss program with ongoing weight loss or taking weight loss medications You have a history of minor surgery You have received investigational drugs within 8 weeks of study start You have hepatitis B or C
